mapper.insert: INSERT linkjobs_resume_apply INTO ( resume_apply_no, hire_announcement_no, member_id, resume_confirm, resume_title, resume_working_form, resume_salary, resume_wish_area, resume_industry2_category, resume_job, resume_self_introduction_title , resume_self_introduction_contents, academic_grade, academic_name, academic_major, academic_major_detail, academic_from_date, academic_to_date, academic_score, career_company_name, career_start_date, career_end_date, career_leaving, career_reason_for_leaving, career_jobgrade_jobposition, career_jobgrade_jobposition_year, career_department, career_salary, career_responsibilities, carrer_project_contents, certificate_name, certificate_date, area_no, job2_no, apply_date ) VALUES( #{resumeApplyNo}, #{hireAnnouncemenNo}, #{memberId}, #{resumeConfirm}, #{resumeTitle}, #{resumeWorkingForm}, #{resumeSalary}, #{resumeWishArea}, #{resumeIndustry2Category}, #{resumeJob}, #{resume_selfIntroductionTitle}, #{resume_selfIntroductionContents}, #{academicGrade}, #{academicName}, #{academicMajor}, #{academicMajorDetail}, #{academicFromDate}, #{academicToDate}, #{academicScore}, #{careerCompanyName}, #{careerStartDate}, #{careerEndDate}, #{careerLeaving}, #{careerReasonForLeaving}, #{careerJobgradeJobposition}, #{careerJobgradeJobpositionYear}, #{careerDepartment}, #{careerSalary}, #{careerResponsibilities}, #{carrerProjectNontents}, #{certificateName}, #{certificateDate}, #{areaNo}, #{job2No}, NOW() )
